name: AmiRobbo
overview: After an attack by the forces of the Xenox Empire on the Princess Izra's fortress, the last handful of defenders have surrendered and you have taken charge. They looted the princess palace hoping to capture her but Robbo, Princess Izra's protective robot is there, with his powerful weapons he destroy's some enemies, giving the princess valuable time to escape in her super fast Starfighter but he eventually gets captured. Robbo is imprisoned on a remote Xenox System and deprived of his weapons and ammunition. Robbo breaks out of prison but he finds the base abandoned. There are only a few broken escape pods left and Robbo has to collect all the screws from the entire base in order to fix the escape pods and return home. Can he escape, It's up to you.
